values.dialog.phone.tutorial.intro: Your job is to pick up guests and take them to their destination.<PAGE>My screen will show you everybody who has called the elevator.<PAGE>Make sure to keep an eye on the battery meter. If it runs out, I'll shut down and you're out of a job!<PAGE>Good luck!
values.dialog.phone.tutorial.end_of_day: Day complete - time to go home!<PAGE>Return to the Ground Floor to clock out.
values.dialog.phone.tutorial.character_effects: Certain guests might respond strangely to being taken in the wrong direction.<PAGE>Rest assured that any strange side effects will most likely wear off within a few turns!
values.dialog.phone.tutorial.punish: Hey there! Due to the ever growing popularity of this hotel, you need to be more careful each turn.<PAGE>I'll lose battery whenever you make mistakes.
values.dialog.character.Blueulet.enter.0: Can you take me to this floor?
values.dialog.character.Blueulet.angry.0: Actually, I think she might be on this floor...
values.dialog.character.Greenulet.enter.0: Hi, can you take me to floor $floorNumDest, please?
values.dialog.character.Greenulet.angry.0: At this rate I'll never find him. See ya...
values.dialog.character.EmalynCat.enter.0: I want to see the world through the eyes of a normal girl!
values.dialog.character.EmalynCat.exit.1: Haven't felt this happy in so long!
values.dialog.character.EmalynCat.angry.0: Did I scare you? Well I'm sorry. But I'm not sorry enough to stop!
values.dialog.character.EmalynCat.angry.1: I feel like I'm stuck between dangerous extremes...
values.dialog.character.Robot.exit.1: The program '[23056] RobotDialog.dll' has exited with code 0 (0x0).
values.dialog.character.Robot.angry.0: Unhandled Exception in thread 'Main': Timed out;
values.dialog.character.ShroomKing.enter.0: Salutations! Me and my men have some business to attend to on floor $floorNumDest.
values.dialog.character.ShroomKing.enter.1: It is I! The Shroom King! I require your assistance to reach floor $floorNumDest.
values.dialog.character.ShroomKing.exit.1: I shall ensure a plot of land for your service to the king!
values.dialog.character.ShroomKing.angry.1: You have failed me for the last time!
values.dialog.character.JellyfishGirl.enter.0: You take me to floor $floorNumDest, oui?
values.dialog.character.Flippy.enter.0: Up or down, I can't decide! Take me here, I love this ride!
values.dialog.character.Flippy.exit.0: Yahoo! That was fun! Anywho, I gotta run!
